docs.snippet: House Speaker Paul Ryan's abandonment of Donald Trump is aimed at protecting Republican control of the House. But it may test his hold on his own job, and his long-term ambitions....
docs.lead_paragraph: House Speaker Paul Ryan's abandonment of Donald Trump is aimed at protecting Republican control of the House. But it may test his hold on his own job, and his long-term ambitions.

headline.main: Ryan's Break From Trump Prompts Talk of GOP Rebellion
headline.print_headline: Ryan's Break From Trump Prompts Talk of GOP Rebellion

docs.snippet: Donald Trump assailed as "absolutely false" the allegations by several women that he groped them, and accused Democratic rival Hillary Clinton, the media and lobbyists of engaging in an effort to stop him from winning the White House....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump assailed as "absolutely false" the allegations by several women that he groped them, and accused Democratic rival Hillary Clinton, the media and lobbyists of engaging in an effort to stop him from winning the White House.

headline.main: 'Absolutely False,' Trump Says Defiantly After Women's Groping Allegations

docs.snippet: The Federal Reserve may want to hold off on monetary policy changes until after the U.S. presidential election on Nov. 8, Philadelphia Fed President Patrick Harker said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve may want to hold off on monetary policy changes until after the U.S. presidential election on Nov. 8, Philadelphia Fed President Patrick Harker said on Thursday.

headline.main: Fed May Want to Delay Policy Changes Until After U.S. Election-Harker
headline.print_headline: Fed May Want to Delay Policy Changes Until After U.S. Election-Harker

docs.snippet: A Mexican director's intense thriller of immigrants pursued by a xenophobic gunman as they try to cross the border into the United States is opening just as the subject of immigration plays a leading role in the U.S. presidential election....

headline.main: Mexican Migrant Thriller 'Desierto' Premieres Amid Border Talk
headline.print_headline: Mexican Migrant Thriller 'Desierto' Premieres Amid Border Talk

docs.snippet: Facing a tough re-election bid in a presidential battleground state, North Carolina U.S. Sen. Richard Burr said Thursday that he accepts Donald Trump's statements that he didn't commit sexual assault and still supports Trump politically because he...
docs.lead_paragraph: Facing a tough re-election bid in a presidential battleground state, North Carolina U.S. Sen. Richard Burr said Thursday that he accepts Donald Trump's statements that he didn't commit sexual assault and still supports Trump politically because he's worried more about Hillary Clinton's "lack of judgment."

headline.main: North Carolina Sen. Burr Takes Trump's Word on Allegations
headline.print_headline: North Carolina Sen. Burr Takes Trump's Word on Allegations

docs.snippet: THE ISSUE: Voters are disgusted with the way political races are paid for — disproportionately by big-money donors, including those who stand to gain or lose from government decisions. The rules even allow donors to hide their identities by ...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE ISSUE: Voters are disgusted with the way political races are paid for — disproportionately by big-money donors, including those who stand to gain or lose from government decisions. The rules even allow donors to hide their identities by giving to politically active nonprofit groups that don't file detailed public paperwork about their finances.

headline.main: WHY IT MATTERS: Money in Politics
headline.print_headline: WHY IT MATTERS: Money in Politics

docs.snippet: Kerry Woolard, the 37-year-old manager of Trump Winery in Charlottesville, Virginia, went online in June and made her first political contribution: A $250 donation to the campaign of her boss, Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kerry Woolard, the 37-year-old manager of Trump Winery in Charlottesville, Virginia, went online in June and made her first political contribution: A $250 donation to the campaign of her boss, Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump.

headline.main: Trump's Missing Donors: The People Who Work for Him

docs.snippet: A citizen's complaint against New Jersey Governor Chris Christie related to the "Bridgegate" lane-closure scandal can move forward, a judge ruled on Thursday, referring the case to state prosecutors to consider possible criminal charges....

docs.snippet: Russia has mounted a campaign of covert economic and political measures to manipulate five countries in central and eastern Europe, discredit the West's liberal democratic model, and undermine trans-Atlantic ties, a report by a private U.S. resear...
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia has mounted a campaign of covert economic and political measures to manipulate five countries in central and eastern Europe, discredit the West's liberal democratic model, and undermine trans-Atlantic ties, a report by a private U.S. research group said.

headline.main: Russia Has 'Playbook' for Covert Influence in Eastern Europe-Study
